name: Escape From Castle Wolegib
description: Project "Gumbo" was a mixture of a person and a gorilla by the mad scientist Dr. Clarence Wolegib in the futuristic year of 2013. Unfortunately for him, Gumbo escaped from his cage, and is now running amok in the doctor's castle, looking for a way out. Will Gumbo be free from Wolegib's labyrinthine castle? Play to find out!
